help-file.title: BUG IDEA TYPO
help-file.content:
Syntax: bug <text> (to report a bug) idea <text> (to send an idea to the Gods of Duris) typo <text> (to report a typo)
These commands are for making useful suggestions to the maintainers of the game.
Examples:
bug The entire game crashes when I type "put 2.bag 2.bag". idea Put an inn in Verspin. typo In the room beside the oiled dragon: "sence" should be "sense".
